title: Horrendous Violence By ISIS Is Unacceptable, U.N. Commissioner Says
teaser: U.N. High Commissioner for Human Rights Zeid Ra'ad Al Hussein tells Renee Montagne that while his fears about Ebola have eased, ISIS, also known as the Islamic State, remains a constant threat.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
